sourcing.instructions:

 Rubidium Sulfide (Rb2S) - Available from specialty chemical suppliers. 
 Titanium Dioxide (TiO2) - Commonly found at art supply stores or chemical suppliers. 
 Lithium Carbonate (Li2CO3) - Obtain from chemical supply companies or online retailers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh all ingredients precisely using an analytical balance. 
 2. In a clean, dry ceramic or glass mixing container, combine 28.8 g of Li2S and 43.2 g of Rb2S. 
 3. Add 24.0 g of TiO2 to the mixture, ensuring thorough distribution. 
 4. Finally, incorporate 10.0 g of Li2CO3, mixing continuously until a homogeneous mixture is achieved.
